data.description: Utilities to convert APC to Subversion
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Rafael Garcia-Suarez and I have written two scripts to convert the
    APC (All Perl Changes) repository at activestate to a subversion
    repository. The scripts need to share some functions which I'd
    suggest to put into the proposed namespace. Maybe it will be
    possible to merge the two scripts into a single one, we don't know
    yet. In any case we want to include the scripts into the module
    distribution.
